text: Tom Hooker or Thomas Barbey (born Thomas Beecher Hooker on November 18, 1957) is an American singer and photographer. He is one of the songwriters of most songs for popular Italo disco artist Den Harrow.Another Island Present: The Saga of Den Harrow ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:singers from Connecticut Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American photographers Category:People from Greenwich, Connecticut
title: Tom Hooker
